text: 9.48 Mat 10.40, 23.11-12, Mak 9.37, Luk 10.16, Jon 12.44, 13.20 agak, Binɨb yɨp gos nɨŋɨd, ñɨsɨkol kɨlop anɨb ak tek dɨnɨgabal okok, kɨlop nep mel, yɨp abe dɨnɨgabal agak. Pen yɨp dɨnɨgabal okok, yɨp nokom mel, Bapi yɨp agyokek ownek ak nop abe dɨnɨgabal agak. Bɨ olap nab nɨbi pi okok yɨb ma mɨdeb ak, ne yɨb mɨdeb agak.
